"I always thought Betsy was beautiful." But when he looked at the picture, he was astonished. "You brought the wrong picture!" he exclaimed. "This isn't Betsy Butterfly; it's a caterpillar. It's eerie!" Jimmy Rabbit remained quiet, smiling as he uncovered the picture once more, bathed in moonlight. "You're mistaken," he said. "This _is_ Betsy Butterfly. I painted it myself; it's a good likeness of her as she once was."
